bactromod.options.title: BacteriaMod Settings
bactromod.options.pumpkinBlur.desc: Disables the blinding ahh pumpkin overlay cuh, see more.
bactromod.options.fireOffset.desc: Moves fire texture in height. Negative means down. Please lower the fire. I can't see.
bactromod.options.shieldOffset.desc: Moves shield in height in first-person. Negative means down. Please speed I need this!
bactromod.options.showMapWhileInBoat.des: What the fuck do you think this option does?
bactromod.options.lavaFog.desc: Disables that thick damn fog caused by diving into lava.
bactromod.options.powderSnowFog.desc: Snowier snow does not mean foggier snow.
bactromod.options.blindnessFog.desc: Blindness becomes you can't sprint simulator!
bactromod.options.darknessFog.desc: The Warden has never been this not scary!
bactromod.options.waterFog.desc: If you still can't see, there's something wrong with you.
bactromod.options.dimensionBossFog.desc: No more thick fog from the nether or ender dragon!
bactromod.options.fixShieldRiptideTriden: Fixes the position of shield in offhand while using riptide trident in water or rain.
